Verses: 2 nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Oru Sthree Karppavadhiyaagi Aanpillaiyaip Petraal, Aval Soodhagasthree Vilakkamaayirukkum Naatkalukku Sariyaaga Ezhunaal Theettaayiruppaal.
3 ettaam Naalile Andhap Pillaiyinudaiya Nuniththolin Maamsam Viruththasedhanampannappadakkadavadhu.

4 pinbu Aval Muppaththumoondrunaal Than Udhira Suththigarippu Nilaiyile Irundhu, Suththigarippin Naatkal Niraiverumalavum Parisuththamaana Yaadhoru Vasthuvaith Thodavum Parisuththa Sthalaththukkul Varavun Koodaadhu.
5 penpillaiyaip Petraalaagil, Aval, Irandu Vaaram Soodhagasthreeyaippolath Theettaayirundhu, Pinbu Arubaththaarunaal Udhira Suththigarippu Nilaiyile Irukkakkadaval.

6 aval Aanpillaiyaiyaavadhu Penpillaiyaiyaavadhu Petradharkaaga Avaludaiya Suththigarippin Naatkal Niraiverinapinbu, Aval Oru Vayadhaana Aattukkuttiyai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum, Oru Puraakkunjaiyaavadhu Kaattuppuraavaiyaavadhu Paavanivaarana Paliyaagavum, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalil Aasaariyanidaththirkuk Konduvarakkadaval.

7 adhai Avan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Paliyittu, Avalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyvaanaaga; Appozhudhu Aval Than Udhira Ooralin Theettu Neengi Suththamaavaal. Idhu Aanpillaiyaiyaavadhu Penpillaiyaiyaavadhu Petravalaikkuriththa Pramaanam.

8 aattukkuttiyaik Konduvara Avalukku Sakthiyillaadhirundhaal, Irandu Kaattuppuraakkalaiyaavadhu Irandu Puraakkunjugalaiyaavadhu, Ondrai Sarvaanga Thaganapaliyaagavum Matrondraip Paavanivaaranapaliyaagavum Konduvarakkadaval; Adhinaal Aasaariyan Avalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seyyakkadavan; Appozhudhu Aval Suththamaavaal Endru Sol Endraar.
